publications.title: Dual branch deep learning network for detection and stage grading of diabetic retinopathy
publications.abstract: A deep learning approach to diabetic retinopathy detection and grading. A dual-branch model is trained on a selectively merged and augmented dataset from public sources that significantly enhanced the classification outcomes.
publications.author: H. Shakibania | S. Raoufi | B. Pourafkham | H. Khotanlou | M. Mansoorizadeh

publications.title: CDAN: Convolutional Dense Attention-guided Network for Low-light Image Enhancement
publications.abstract: An autoencoder-based model for enhancing low-light images across challenging lighting conditions.
publications.author: H. Shakibania | S. Raoufi | H. Khotanlou

publications.title: Brain tumor classification using deep convolutional autoencoder-based neural network: multi-task approach
publications.abstract: This paper proposes a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) method utilizing a Convolutional Auto-Encoder Neural Network (CANN) to diagnose and classify brain tumors in MRI images into 5 categories, achieving high accuracy rates up to 99.3%.
publications.author: F. BashirGonbadi | H. Khotanlou

publications.title: Point-PlaneNet: Plane kernel based convolutional neural network for point clouds analysis
publications.abstract: This paper introduces Point-PlaneNet, a novel convolutional neural network utilizing PointConv to extract local geometric features from raw point clouds without transforming them to images or volumes, showing promising results in various 3D data analysis tasks.
publications.author: SMM. Peyghambarzadeh | F. Azizmalayeri | H. Khotanlou | A. Salarpour

publications.title: An Efficient Approach for Using Expectation Maximization Algorithm in Capsule Networks
publications.abstract: The paper investigates optimizing Capsule Networks (CapsNets) by adjusting Expectation-Maximization (EM) routing iterations to address their drawbacks, achieving faster training and improved accuracies across multiple datasets.
publications.journal: International Conference on Machine Vision and Image Processing (MVIP)
publications.author: M. Hasani | AN. Saravi | H. Khotanlou

publications.title: Glioma Brain Tumors Diagnosis and Classification in MR Images based on Convolutional Neural Networks
publications.abstract: This paper proposes a novel Convolutional Neural Network-based method for classifying Glioma tumors in MRI images into three categories: Normal Brain, High-Grade Glioma, and Low-Grade Glioma, achieving an accuracy of 99.18%.
publications.journal: 9th International Conference on Computer and Knowledge Engineering (ICCKE)
publications.author: F. BashirGonbadi | H. Khotanlou

publications.title: Kernel Correlation Based CNN for Point Cloud Classification Task
publications.abstract: A novel method for processing point cloud data, leveraging adapted kernel correlation techniques to develop a CNN-like approach.
publications.journal: 8th International Conference on Computer and Knowledge Engineering (ICCKE)
publications.author: F. Azizmalayeri | SMM. Peyghambarzadeh | H. Khotanlou; | A. Salarpour
